= Plugins Manager Download =

The easiest way to get the plugins is to install [/wiki/PluginsManager/ Plugins Manager]. Then you'll be able to install any other plugins just by clicking chekbox. Plugins Manager is available from "Options" menu of JMeter.

<p class="alert alert-success">
Download *[/get/ plugins-manager.jar]* and put it into {{{lib/ext}}} directory, then restart JMeter.
</p>
